text: A permanent solution to a temporary problem I really don t think what I ve got is a temporary problem I ve got a huge big world of injustice  with a fuck load of people who are more powerful and frankly a lot smarter than me who stand to benefit from keeping the world unjust I ve got the ever impending collapse of the worlds natural resources  an issue that seemingly everyone cares about but not enough to actually change any of their behavior I ve got storms and fires and all the natural forces of the world laying waste to shit like antibodies that humanity is too advanced to be crushed by I ve got a peer group from which I m totally alienated because I just don t understand normal people that well  something I ve worked at my whole life but I just can t do I ve got a bad fucked up brain that can t make chemicals in the right amounts to let me see a silver lining to any of this  and I m pretty fucking sure these issues are pretty much fixtures of my life  And I m afraid  now  not of dying but of living Living and seeing nothing improve  living and being forces to bear witness to the slow moving apocalypse  to the ending of all love  and to wake up one day  be older and wiser and just as miserable as I am now  and wishing I had just ended things a long time ago  Fuck

People who are more powerful and smarter than me stand to benefit from keeping the world unjust. I am alienated from my peers because I don't understand normal people.
